GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.58
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix data-races around sysctl_tcp_migrate_req.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.58 by commit fcf6c6d8aeffebca66f37b17ef1b57112e5e09c1, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit f9ac779f881c2ec3d1cdcd7fa9d4f9442bf60e80. For more details please see the references link.
